mdRecord.dcterms:title: KINETOGRAPH #17
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Abstract painter and teacher Richard Irving Bowman was known for both his idiosyncratic style and employing fluorescent paint. He received his BFA from the Art Institute of Chicago and his MFA from the University of Iowa. Bowman taught painting at the Art Institute of Chicago, the University of Manitoba, Winnipeg and tanford University. he was a popular figure in the an Francisco abstract expressionist and beat scenes.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Virginia,Art,PAINTING
